content.text:
# Logie Awards of 2025

|site             = The Star, Sydney, New South Wales
|host             = Sam Pang
|website          =
|gold             = Lynne McGranger
|hall_of_fame     = Magda Szubanski
|most_wins        = Fisk (5)
|most_nominations = Apple Cider Vinegar (8)
|network          = Seven Network
|last             = 64th
|next             = 66th
}}
The 65th Annual TV Week Logie Awards ceremony was held on 3 August 2025 at the Star, Sydney and broadcast on the Seven Network. The ceremony was hosted by Sam Pang, returning for his third consecutive year.
Winners and nominees
Nominees were announced on 16 June 2025.
Gold Logie
{| class=wikitable width="50%"
|-
! width="25%"| Most Popular Personality on Australian Television
|-
| valign="top" |
*'Lynne McGranger in Home and Away (Seven Network)'
**Ally Langdon in A Current Affair and Olympic Games Paris 2024 (Nine Network)
**Hamish Blake in Lego Masters (Nine Network)
**Julia Morris in ''I'm a Celebrity...Get Me Out of Here! (Network 10)
**Lisa Millar in Back Roads, News Breakfast, Muster Dogs: Collies & Kelpies and Muster Dogs: Where Are They Now (ABC)
**Poh Ling Yeow in MasterChef Australia (Network 10)
**Sonia Kruger in The Voice, Dancing with the Stars and Logies Red Carpet (Seven Network)
|}
